channel.description: Recent content in Page on Eat This Radio

item.title: About
item.description:
Eat This Radio is a platform for alternative music made by music lovers. We bring you mixes made by us, our friends and heroes. There is no regular schedule, we add new mixes when we get them. Check back on this website or follow us on Facebook

Eat This Radio is made by:
Bastiaan Verhage
LN
Wouter van Veldhoven

With many thanks to:
Michaela Jung
Ingo
Robhar
